showroom.address: Puteri Harbour International Ferry Terminal Lebuh Bahtera, Kota Iskandar, 79100 Iskandar Puteri, Johor

description: Puteri Harbour International Ferry Terminal is strategically located in Iskandar Puteri, Johor and is owned & operated by UEM Sunrise Berhad. PHIFT is a two-storey building with a T-shaped jetty that can accommodate four ferries to berth at one time. The ferry terminal also provides offices to 7 Government Agencies; Jabatan Imigresen, Kastam DiRaja Malaysia (KDRM), Jabatan Kesihatan, Pejabat Kawalan Perjalanan (TCO), Polis DiRaja Malaysia (PDRM) and Jabatan Kuarantin (MAQIS).
